text: Nectandra barbellata is a species of plant in the family Lauraceae. It is endemic to Brazil. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== barbellata Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Atlantic Forest (biome) Category:Flora of Espírito Santo Category:Flora of São Paulo (state) Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Nectandra barbellata
